everyone makes the same mistakes I mean

different income levels different

think there's
enough um tendency to really do what I

develop that local management team see
the everything changed for the better
for us when I started surrounding myself

I told you about because then they

clearer because they knew it was going
on see before that I tended to have
people that were non-chinese that were
maybe knew the language or whatever were
supposed to be China experts but they
didn't really understand what was going
on you really need the local Chinese to
tell you what's going on so you need to
surround yourself with people and get
that kind of an input and I think most
people can't kind of get to the point
where they trust the local Chinese
enough to do that they always want to
second guess them when I think your your
better instinct is to go with
